[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1603132358336{padding-top: 260px !important;padding-bottom: 200px !important;background-image: url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/DSC08316.jpg?id=8448) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” top_section_title=”” bottom_section_title=””][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1513003956648{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″ css=”.vc_custom_1513004658055{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1513008591637{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Retirement Party” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:70|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” google_fonts=”font_family:Great%20Vibes%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” kd_fixed_background=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1603020760694{background: #ffffff url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/inline_image_preview.jpg?id=8317) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”8370″ img_size=”1200*800″ onclick=”link_image” css_animation=”fadeInLeft”][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Retirement Party” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:60|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” google_fonts=”font_family:Lobster%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_column_text]

With the transformation in thinking and a zeal to celebrate and find happiness in everything, The concept of retirement party is changed altogether, after working hard for years in full swing and making that memory. The moment of Retirement is crafted as a celebration. The family, friends, and relatives of the retired person want to give a message through a celebration that this moment is a moment of Pride and Honour.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” kd_fixed_background=”true” kd_image_overlay=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1603020747350{background-image: url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/blue-white-bokeh-background-vector-6344567.jpg?id=7741) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Why Archi Events?” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:60|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Lobster%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInLeft”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInLeft”]

Archi Events precisely understands this feeling of pride, honor, and emotion and ensures that these moments are planned and implemented joyfully and festively. We maintain the decorum and thoroughly understands the responsibility of being the best retirement planners.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”8446″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right” style=”vc_box_border_circle” border_color=”black” onclick=”link_image” css_animation=”fadeInRight”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” kd_fixed_background=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1603020737689{background-image: url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/bd9e0717572f75bc6a7c5e2687d4e5bc-scaled.jpg?id=7963) !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_single_image image=”8447″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_border” border_color=”black”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Services we Provide” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:60|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” google_fonts=”font_family:Lobster%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInRight”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInRight”]

  • Theme based Entry from Office to Venue
  • Venue Selection
  • Catering & food preparation
  • Guest Entertainment Services
  • Amazing Photography
  • Retirement Party Management
  • And Many More Services …………

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
